title: How do you handle an empty glyph?
content: I am building a limited glyph truetype font. This font has only 10 or 15 glyphs that represent map symbols. The rest of the glyphs are empty. Working in FontLab, what is the recommended approach to these non-existent glyphs? Leave them untouched? Fill them with a zero width character? Place some sort of nondef symbol in each codepoint? This font will be functioning only in a WIndows environment. Any advice would be appreciated.
author: terminaldesign

comments.content:
You could fill them with your logo.
